name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Proficient in **Python**, **gRPC**, and **REST APIs** with over 13 years of experience in full stack development, delivering high-performance applications in healthcare and financial sectors. Adept at leveraging **Kubernetes** and **Docker** for container orchestration and deployment within CI/CD pipelines, ensuring seamless microservices integration. Demonstrated ability in problem-solving and team collaboration, effectively utilizing modern development practices to simplify complex processes.
Experienced in both frontend and backend development using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, and **Node.js**, as well as backend frameworks like **FastAPI** and **Django**. Strong background in building AI/ML-powered platforms and deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**. Committed to compliance-driven development, aligning with HIPAA, FHIR, and PCI DSS standards while maintaining high operational excellence.
